REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f2040 reute r f BC-INT'L-BANKNOTE-<IBK> 06-29 0048

TEXT.TITLE: INT'L BANKNOTE <IBK> EXCHANGES DEBENTURES
TEXT.BODY: International Banknote Co Inc said it accepted for exchange 3,484,000 dlrs principal amount of its 10-1/4 pct subordinated debentures due Aug 1, 1998. It said the exchange was part of its offer, which expired June 26. Reuter
